works.description:
The album, Romina Elefant's Gallery, 'I  
have AD', contains, in total, 61 scanned images of the first page of Alan 

Dart's copyrighted knitting patterns.  From the comments you will see she 

regularly exchanges the complete patterns with other members, which  
infringes Alan's copyright, and is illegal. As some of the patterns are of
 
licensed toys, this also infringes the rights of the licence holders. It  
also includes 2 downloaded patterns which are exclusive to Alan's site,
and  
this affects his income. Below is the album's url, the urls of the two  
stolen patterns and the urls of a representative 5 (of 61) of the
patterns.
